resource.name: Personal Income Tax Statistics By Zip Code
resource.description: This dataset contains data from California resident tax returns filed with California adjusted gross income and self-assessed tax listed by zip code.  This dataset contains data for taxable years 1992 to the most recent tax year available.

Federal Adjusted Gross Income (AGI) is an individual's total gross income minus specific deductions or adjustments.

Adjusted Gross Income Category (AGIC) is the category of taxpayers whose income falls within a specified adjusted gross income range.
Taxable year for which tax returns were filed in a number format that can be used for display in charts.
Cumulative percentage of the taxable income amount within each AGIC range out of the total taxable income amount of all AGIC ranges.

Cumulative percentage of the percent of adjusted gross income.
Total California Adjusted Gross Income (AGIC) before California deductions.
Number of returns filed.
